metadata.synopsis: This is a fallback one-liner. In case the Player manages to approach her an initiate dialog in TWN, Korrilla gives a cryptic one-liner to the player. No Hasmet node is needed, as she teleports away right after.She would be struggling with the shadow curse as she says this line.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Open ReCon and use "statusapply INVISIBILITY", and also "god" to protect you from the shadowcurse.Go to -111; 24; -29 in SCL_Main_A which teleports Korrilla to-108; 24; -19.  Approach Korrilla and initiate dialog. If you are not invisible, she should teleport away if she sees you approach.

0.speaker: Korrilla
0.text: Tr-tread carefully. You are still... necessary.
0.context: NodeContext: the ellipses and hyphens here are to denote her struggling to get the words out as she's afflicted with shadowcurse
